summary: This is Olaf, star of YouTube series \'Rags to Riches\'. He\'s a simple nord peasant with dreams of fortune and glory, and a master level archer.
descriptionHtml:
This is Olaf, star of YouTube series \'Rags to Riches\'. He\'s a simple nord peasant with dreams of fortune and glory, and a master level archer.

You can watch his adventures here: [url=http://www.youtube.com/show/skyrimragstoriches]http://www.youtube.com/show/skyrimragstoriches[/url]

Be sure to check his inventory. He has a diary that\'ll boost your archery skills, and some cabbages (obviously). You\'ll find Olaf propping up the bar in Whiterun\'s Drunken Huntsman tavern.

Installation is easy. Either download it with the Nexus Mod Manager, or just copy the contents of the .rar into your Skyrim \'data\' folder. When Windows asks if you want to merge folders, say yes. Nothing will be overwritten. Voila!

Want a special bow and armour set for Olaf? Check out Dragonis0\'s amazing mod here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23074]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23074[/url]
author: ultrabrilliant
